title: Unleash Your Buddha Nature
description: This is a guide to looking at Buddhism in a unique way. It is about looking at Buddhism with a sense of excitement. Like many religions, Buddhism is looked at by some as a dry and intellectual belief system. But, it is something to be excited about. Buddhism is about awakening your Buddha Nature. It's about clearing delusion and becoming your true self. Your true self is one with everything.
author: Daniel J. Scharpenburg
